Name: Octopus Bar
About the game: Enter this hidden izakaya bar hidden deep in the magical forest, where the octopus serves you, fish float into the sky, and a frog enjoys your company. In this world the impossible is now possible and you are invited to discover the games and enjoy this whimsical scenery. You will be asked by the Octopus to do simple task: . Chasing and catching a chicken for him to cook. . Feed your frog friend the chicken and why not give him a little tickle! . Shoot all the balloon fish with your ninja star crossbow. . Find and shoot all the hidden “teru teru bozu” ghosts. . Set the dragon free and enjoy watching him fly through the night sky.
Meta Title: Octopus Bar: Sep 22, 2017, Thomas Meduri and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Octopus Bar? Check out the release date (Sep 22, 2017), developer insights from Thomas Meduri, and a complete game summary.
